message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. What do you say?
Meet me halfway, let's end this!
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I need a bigger cut to make it worth my while.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I still want a decent cut!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share to make this worth my while.
I'm not getting any younger either, Alice. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need to take what I can get to make a living.
I'm not going to let you take the whole pie, Alice. I'm making a serious offer!
I'm not leaving anything on the table, Bob. Take it or leave it.
This is my last serious offer, Alice. Take it or walk away!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take the crumbs if you want.
I'd rather get nothing than let you take almost everything, Alice. This is my final offer!
